overview: In the New Mexico desert, pie equals love. Kathy Knapp left her privileged life to bake pie in dusty Pie Town, a once forgotten corner of the world with few amenities. Why? To find her center and give the world pie. This is her story.
tagline: In a town with no traffic light, gas station, grocery store or motel, one thing is certain: pie equals love.
title: Pie Lady of Pie Town
